name: The Angry Lands
description:
The lands are quite angry these days like hecka angry like at least a 10 on angry.  From bushes to nematodes everything is quite miffed the nematodes are extra miffed!

Angry Lands is a game combining an rpg-like overworld with a platformer combat system.  I've been wanting to make a game like this for a while.  Some of the art, such as the player and nematode was made by Diddly Dan.  

Controls

Arrow Keys = Move

X = Attack

Z = Jump
